speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I announce to the membership that there will be no further rollcall votes during today's session.

Mr. President, I thank the assistant majority leader for advising us that we won't have to continue the frenetic pace of voting this evening. I look forward to working with him. He is a pleasure to work with. Maybe tomorrow we will be able to go forward.
I was going to offer some thoughts on the intent of FISA, but I will defer to my colleague from Georgia if he has further points he wishes to raise.
Mr. President, I am happy to yield to the vice chairman if he has prepared comments he intends to make. If I have something to supplement that, I will do so.
